about_the_game:
QA Simulator is an immersive and engaging simulation game that puts you in the role of a software quality assurance (QA) engineer. Dive into the intricate and realistic world of software testing, uncover bugs, and ensure the highest quality for the digital products you work on.

Key Features

  • Realistic QA Workflow:

    • Experience the day-to-day responsibilities of a QA engineer, including bug reporting, test case creation, and regression testing.

    • Work with a variety of software applications, from simple apps to complex systems, mimicking real-world scenarios.

  • Dynamic Gameplay:

    • Encounter unexpected challenges such as tight deadlines, evolving requirements, and team dynamics.

    • Use critical thinking to prioritize tasks and choose the best testing strategies.

  • Skill Progression and Customization:

    • Build your character’s skills, including attention to detail, communication, and technical expertise.

    • Unlock new tools, environments, and testing challenges as you progress.

  • Realistic Tools and Techniques:

    • Utilize authentic testing tools such as bug trackers, automation scripts, and debugging software.

    • Simulate testing in various environments, from web applications to desktop platforms.

  • Educational and Entertaining:

    • Learn about the principles and practices of software testing in an entertaining way.

    • Perfect for players curious about the IT industry or those who want to sharpen their QA skills.

What’s Included

  • Access to the full game with all features listed above.

  • Future updates and bug fixes to enhance your gaming experience.

  • Future optional downloadable content (DLC - Mobile Application Testing, Game Testing, Advanced Testing Types) with additional projects and story expansions.

Whether you're an aspiring QA engineer or simply love simulation games with a unique twist, QA Simulator will challenge your skills and immerse you in the fascinating world of software quality assurance. Are you ready to take on the bugs and ensure perfection?
